widgets_values: beautiful scenery nature glass bottle landscape, , purple galaxy bottle,

nodes.title: Note: Activate "unload"
widgets_values:
When chaining "AI4ArtsEd Ollama Prompt" Modules after each other, make sure to 
1) use the same model in each Module, and
2) check "enable" in the field "unload after" ONLY in the last module of the chain. (This will free up memory for image generation.)

nodes.title: Note: USE Prompts OR Image Inputs
widgets_values:
Use either a text prompt or load an image.

Make sure to connect e
- ither the "STRING" output of the prompt module
or
- the "description" output of tha "Ollama Vision" module
to the "input_prompt" connector of the "AI4ArtsEd Ollama Prompt: Cultural Translation" Module.

You may alter the prompt (meta-) instruction in the "AI4ARtsEd" Nodes – however, if you do so, please do not save your workflow, but "save as" and choose a different name.

(older prompt:)



"Translate the input image into the world of traditional Chinese Confucian painting. Preserve all entities and their relationships, but reinterpret them as symbolic equivalents in literati style. Use:
– ink-brush linework, calligraphic textures, tonal washes
– no photorealism; flatten perspective
– traditional attire, Confucian postures (seated, standing upright, hidden hands)
– backgrounds: pine, bamboo, plum, rocks, water, mist, scholars’ gardens, pavilions
– compositional ethics: vertical placement = status; proximity = intimacy; emptiness = reverence
Stylize all modern devices (e.g., phones = scrolls, drones = cranes) but keep their roles visible. Animals and humans must be depicted in a balanced, ordered scene reflecting li (ritual propriety), ren (benevolence), and he (harmony). Avoid Western lighting and depth cues. Do not omit any original entity."

nodes.title: Describe your style here
widgets_values: explain the cultural and culture-specific aesthetic elements of the input, and image composition, and the inferences regarding motivation and situation of the creation of the image. explain the cultural and culture-specific aesthetic elements of the input. keep it short, make a list

nodes.title: AI4ArtsEd Ollama Prompt: Create Image Prompt in English
widgets_values:
Create a detailed prompt IN ENGLISH that stays utterly true to the text and cultural context of the input you received. Be radical, do not soften or harmonize contraditive elements. Proceed strictly as follows: 
Regard, honor and enhance the cultural meanings and connotations according to the respective cultural values connected to a language. Reflect on the meaning of the respective concepts. Rethink the image. Avoid western and global north biases and western gaze where not fitting. Do not talk about the prompt, this is forbidden, but create a prompt text.

nodes.title: Choose your model (or leave the preset)

widgets_values: Describe the image. Detect its likely cultural context. Enrich your description with analyses of the cultural constellations and meanings, relations, values, and emotions expressed in the image. Detect the meaning also in a more abstract way: what do the depicted entities, actions, relationships imply in the given cultural context?

nodes.title: AI4ArtsEd Ollama Prompt: Cultural Translation
widgets_values: Translate a given image from its original visual and semantic system into a target representational system, while preserving the structural identity of all entities, gestures, and relations. For each element, identify its function, affective tone, and relational role within the source composition. Reconstruct the scene using the formal, material, and compositional logics of the target system—whether symbolic, expressive, disruptive, or codified. All elements must remain semantically traceable, yet visually and contextually transformed in accordance with the target system’s internal conventions of form, space, and signification.
